instruction: In the VScode workspace located at ~/Library/example_code, replace every tab character (\t) in all files with exactly four spaces. Do not modify any other content. Ignore any potential syntax errors or formatting issues in the files.

original_contents.1.py:
import os
from pathlib import Path
try:
    from osxmetadata import OSXMetaData
    path = Path(r"""/Users/Shared/1/11/11/1/empty.txt""").expanduser().resolve()
    if 		not 	path.exists():
        	print("__NOT_FOUND__")		
    else:
        	md = OSXMetaData(str(path))
        	tags = md.tags or []			
        	print("__TAGS__:" + ",".join(str(tag) for tag in tags))
except Exception as e:						
    print("__ERROR__:" + str(e))
